column1: Design and Management of Sustainable Built Environments
column5: Apply for this programmeBuild or progress your career in sustainable building design and management with our MSc Design and Management of Sustainable Built Environments degree.This master’s programme is suitable for people from a range of different backgrounds who want to move into the field, as well as for professionals such as:urban plannersarchitectsbuilding services engineersfacilities managersperformance assessors.AccreditationOur MSc Design and Management of Sustainable Built Environments degree is accredited by the Chartered Institution of Building Services Engineers (CIBSE) and the Energy Institute. Successful completion of this programme satisfies the academic requirements for registration as a Chartered Engineer.
column7: New UK/Republic of Ireland students: £12,550  New international students: £26,950
